data.title: All Day, Anywhere
data.text: 4Heworth - Houghton le SpringT&W Day Rover eligible for full route when purchased in T&W, if boarding in County Durham customer must buy Durham Day Rover or TNE Day Saver if journey extends into T&W28Chester le Street - NewcastleT&W Day Rover eligible for journeys as far as Birtley Station Lane Brickworks. Durham Day Rover eligible for journeys as far as Birtley Station Lane Brickworks. If crossing the boundary in either direction the only valid BSIP adult fare is the TNE Day Saver.29Chester le Street - NewcastleT&W Day Rover eligible for journeys as far as Kibblesworth. Durham Day Rover eligible for journeys as far as Ouston. If crossing the boundary in either direction the only valid BSIP adult fare is the TNE Day Saver.37Newcastle - CramlingtonT&W Day Rover eligible for journeys as far as Dudley Lane – Northern Terrace. Northumberland Day Rover is eligible for journeys as far as Dudley Lane-Northern Terrace. If crossing the boundary in either direction the only valid BSIP adult fare is the TNE Day Saver.59Durham - HartlepoolDurham Day and TNE Day Saver’s only applicable for journeys wholly within TNE zone. If boarding or alighting outside of zone the products are not valid.61Sunderland - PeterleeT&W Day Rover eligible for journeys between Sunderland and Easington Lane. Durham Day Rover eligble for journeys between Peterlee and Seaham Grange Grange Mount House. If travelling from Tyne & Wear south of Easington Lane the only valid BSIP adult fare would be the TNE Day Saver. If travelling from County Durham north of Seaham Grange the only valid BSIP adult fare would be the TNE Day Saver.65Durham - SeahamDurham Day Rover eligible for full route when purchased in County Durham, if boarding in T&W customer must buy T&W Day Rover or TNE Day Saver if journey extends in County Durham.71Chester le Street - SeahamDurham Day Rover eligble for full route when purchased in County Durham, if boarding in T&W customer must buy T&W Day Rover or TNE Day Saver if journey extends into County Durham.681Birdoswald - AlstonNorthumberland Day Rover and TNE Day Saver’s only applicable for journeys wholly within TNE Zone. If boarding or alighting outside of zone the products are not valid.685Carlisle - NewcastleT&W Day Rover valid for journeys to Frenchmans Row, Northumberland Day Rover valid between Frenchman’s Row – Greenhead. TNE Day Saver eligible for journeys wholly within TNE Zone. If boarding or alighting outside of zone the products are not valid.686Wylam - PrudhoeNorthumberland Day Rover eligible for full route when purchased in Northumberland, if boarding in T&W customer must buy T&W Day Rover or TNE Day Saver if journey extends in Northumberland.933Team Valley - Rowlands GillT&W Day Rover eligible for full route when purchased in T&W, if boarding in County Durham customer must buy Durham Day Rover or TNE Day Saver if journey extends into T&W.57AAshington - North ShieldsNorthumberland Day Rover eligible for journeys as far as Holywell village (Nursery). T&W Day Rover eligible for journeys as far as Annitsford Front Street. TNE Day Saver eligible for entire route. If travelling from Tyne & Wear north of Annitsford Front Street the only valid BSIP adult fare would be the TNE Day Saver. If travelling from Northumerbland south of Holywell village (Nursery) the only valid BSIP adult fare would be the TNE Day Saver.84/84ADarlington - Barnard CastleDurham Day Rover and TNE Day Saver eligible for journeys as far as Ingleton Garths. If boarding or alighting outside of zone the products are not valid.AD122Hexham - HaltwhistleNorthumberland and TNE Day Saver valid for entire route.
